name: remove_internal_loads_directly_assigned_to_spaces
display_name: Remove Internal Loads Directly Assigned to Spaces
modeler_description_xml: If you just assign space types without removing loads assigned directly to space, you can end up with double loads.
description_xml: This will removed all internal loads assigned directly to spaces. This can be useful if your model started as an IDF, and now you want to assign space types.
